data.message: I just had a young lady by the name of Butler J Gardenia, friend request me. She claims to be a Facebook agent and has "informed" me that I just won 500,000.00 from Facebook by being #14 on a list of random people's facebook profiles that was chosen to win.  She is requesting my full home address, my email address, phone number, Full name and Occupation.  Is this real? or is it a scam?

replies.message: Hey Christina, this looks like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these tips: http://on.fb.me/22VB6lt. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Nancy
